TopicTitle: If I still don't have v0.14.4

Articles.Content: I bought KSP on Saturday evening and read that I will most likely get it in Monday and not the weekend, but if I still don\'t have it and there is no confirmation email from PayPal is it safe to buy again?
Check PayPal transaction history to be certain, and if your KSP order isn\'t shown, then try to purchase it again.

You need to check with whatever payment method you used; there should be a record either at paypal or on your credit card account.

You can always send an email to support via the contact page, keep in mind it may take just as long to receive a reply there as it will to finish filling the KSP orders manually.

Please keep discussion of this issue to this thread, please: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=10846.0
